Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>
Entry.EnglishText: <Dio>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mint>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mint>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Arche>
Entry.EnglishText: <Arche>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Suzu>
Entry.EnglishText: <Suzu>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Rondoline>
Entry.EnglishText: <Rondoline>

Entry.EnglishText: <Mel>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claus>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claus>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cless>
Entry.EnglishText: <Cless>

Entry.JapaneseText: Variable
……今のって…… 何なんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...What happened just now...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 瘴気……魔界のことわりで できたガスです
Entry.EnglishText: It's Miasma...A warning from the Daemonium manifested as poisonous gas.

Entry.JapaneseText: 魔界の住民たちが 生命活動を行ううえで ある程度必要なものだそうです
Entry.EnglishText: To some degree, it is necessary for creatures of the Daemonium to survive.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、人間には すごく毒なんだよね
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah but for us that stuff is pretty poisonous...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私の仲間たちはみんな、 あれにやられたのでしょう
Entry.EnglishText: Many of my people have been felled by such thing...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、間違いありません、 あの洞窟にプルートがいます
Entry.EnglishText: Be as it may, Pluto lies in that cave undoubtedly.

Entry.JapaneseText: だとすると、 なんとかして入る方法が あればいいんだけど
Entry.EnglishText: That may be it but we probably should think of another way to get inside.

Entry.JapaneseText: 瘴気をなくす方法、 ですか？
Entry.EnglishText: You mean to get rid of the Miasma, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……オリジンに 頼むというのはどうだろう
Entry.EnglishText: ...How about we ask help from Origin?

Entry.JapaneseText: オリジンって…… 精霊の王様だろ？
Entry.EnglishText: By Origin you mean...the King of the Spirits?

Entry.JapaneseText: 昔話によく出てくんぜ？ 今のアセリアの基礎を 作ったヤツだって
Entry.EnglishText: Isn't that from an old legend? The guy responsible for creating the foundations of modern Aselia?

Entry.JapaneseText: あの瘴気を浄化するには、 万物を司るくらいの力でないと 難しいかもしれない
Entry.EnglishText: It'd be quite a feat to purify the Miasma. I believe we'd need nothing less than the power responsible for the creation of all things.

Entry.JapaneseText: オリジンだったら、 世界中の瘴気も 浄化できるんじゃないかな？
Entry.EnglishText: So you think Origin could help us cleanse the Miasma from the world, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: かもしれないな
Entry.EnglishText: It could work, yeah.

Entry.JapaneseText: でもさ、オリジン、 また出てきてくれるかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah that's all nice but how are we even supposed to meet him?

Entry.JapaneseText: オリジンが姿を見せたのは ラグナロクの時とダオス戦役の 時だけだと言いますから……
Entry.EnglishText: Origin has been said to only manifest physically during the Ragnarok and the war against Dhaos...

Entry.JapaneseText: ダメかどうかは、 やってみないと わかんねーだろ
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, if it's possible or not we won't know till we try!

Entry.JapaneseText: そう、だね。 行ってみましょう
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, that's right. Let's give it a try!
